original_text: After the Sabbath, at dawn on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary went to look at the tomb.
korean_text: 안식일이 다 지나고 안식 후 첫날이 되려는 새벽에 막달라 마리아와 다른 마리아가 무덤을 보려고 갔더니

sentences.original_text: at dawn on the first day of the week
Mary Magdalene and the other Mary
went to look at the tomb
